Aah I briefly played the first one and just remembered that I beat the one for the DS! Loved this track. And I miss my gamecube. 
I played a lot with Joe in Wii's Tatsunoko vs Capcpm too!
author: Lucio Fernandes

text:
If there's one series I've been wanting a new game in, it's Viewtiful Joe.  The first and second games even go so far as to mention a VJ3, but it's been 14-ish years, so it seems unlikely we'll ever get it.  

It's a real shame too, because as a big fan of lots of Capcom's IPs, the original Viewtiful Joe is my favorite of them all.  I definitely recommend them for anyone who wants a stylish beat-em-up/platformer with that Kamiya charm.
author: Demi Fiend
